extension.name: Ninject.Dynamic
extension.description: Provides a DLR-based fluent interface for declaring Ninject bindings

extension.name: Ninject.Extensions.Conventions
extension.description: Provides convention based binding for Ninject modeled after the StructureMap 2.5 AssemblyScanner by Jeremy Miller.

extension.name: Ninject.Extensions.Interception
extension.description: Originally by Nate Kohari, ported to Ninject 2.0 and enhanced by Ian Davis

extension.name: Ninject.Extensions.Logging
extension.description: Originally by Nate Kohari, ported to Ninject 2.0 by Ian Davis.

extension.name: Ninject.Extensions.MessageBroker
extension.description: Allows a many-to-many publish/subscribe model between loosely-coupled components. Originally by Nate Kohari, ported to Ninject 2.0 by Ian Davis.

extension.name: Ninject.Extensions.Wcf
extension.description: Allows integration between Ninject and the Windows Communication Framework (WCF).

extension.name: Ninject.Extensions.WeakEventMessageBroker
extension.description: Allows a many-to-many publish/subscribe model between loosely-coupled components held together by weaks events to automatically disconnect publishers/subscribers. Originally based on Ninject.Extensions.MessageBroker.

extension.name: Ninject.Extensions.Xml
extension.description: Allows users to define bindings using XML rather than code.

extension.name: Ninject.Moq
extension.description: Provides auto-mocking container support for Moq.

extension.name: Ninject.Web
extension.description: Allows integration between Ninject and ASP.NET WebForms. Originally by Nate Kohari, ported to Ninject 2.0 by Ian Davis.

extension.name: Ninject.Web.Mvc
extension.description: Allows integration between Ninject and ASP.NET MVC. (It powers this website! Check out the source to see how.)
